Our Solution

Cambridge Construction Intelligence automatically integrates diverse data streams into structured, standardised productivity metrics.

A unified AI platform to measure, benchmark, and improve construction productivity

Our platform provides:

  • A consistent data collection framework for any project
  • Automated integration of progress, schedules, field data, logistics, and visual data
  • Novel productivity metrics and visualisations (e.g., flowlines, plan vs actual, blockers)
  • Benchmarks to compare performance within and between projects
  • Near real-time insights to identify inefficiencies and optimise workflows

Unlike traditional progress monitoring tools, our system measures actual productivity, not just progress, using integrated intelligence proven across pilot studies with Tier 1 and Tier 2 UK contractors.

The Benefits of Our Technology

For Contractors

  • Clear visibility of real productivity
  • Faster identification of delays and inefficiencies
  • Data-driven decision-making
  • Better sequencing and coordination
  • Stronger commercial and tendering positions
  • Reduced programme uncertainty and risk

For Clients & Developers

  • Transparent evidence of performance
  • Improved predictability and control
  • Assurance that productivity is tracked consistently
  • Insights to support MMC, DfMA, and modern delivery models

For the Entire Project Ecosystem

  • Shared metrics and language
  • Fewer disputes and subjective interpretations
  • Stronger learning culture across projects
  • Benchmarking that improves long-term performance
